snippet: Policies that encouraged the growth of unregulated lenders should be altered before it is too late.
abstract: Editorial welcomes signs that China's top officials appear to be moving to address the risks posed by country's so-called shadow banking system; contends that success of regulators to reign in shadow banking system will be determined in large part by the willingness of the country's leaders to end the policies that encouraged its growth in the first place.
lead_paragraph: Policies that encouraged the growth of unregulated lenders should be altered before it is too late.
